Html:
Hi

Cool app :)

I have just downloaded the source code and opened it up in Visual Studio 2010 on 64bit Windows 7.  I have the latest DirectX SDK installed.  When attempting to compile it, I get:

"error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'qedit.h': No such file or directory D:\Downloads\dot Net\DirectShow\touchless-55790\trunk\Touchless\WebCamLib\WebCamLib.cpp 19 1 WebCamLib"

Any ideas?  Do I need to read some compilation document?

Thanks,
Stephen

Perhaps the post may help you.

A common advice is to have DirectX SDK August 2007 installed on your PC, and not the latest one...

However MSDN page about ISampleGrabberCB Interface suggests to install older version of Microsoft® Windows® Software Development Kit Update for Windows Vista™ .
